Content.Text: A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Black Butler's Uniforms</BLUE> you recently shipped
have become big hits with the young cityfolk!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

The <BLUE>Girls' Jumpsuits</BLUE> you shipped to us are all over
the place here! Everybody loves them!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>Witchy Wear</BLUE> you shipped to us is the new
fashion with all the young ladies here!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Tropical Pareos</BLUE> you shipped are a
smash hit with all the folks back home!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Green Merchant Wear</BLUE> you shipped has
become all the rage with the young people here.
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Hello. The girls here all adore the <BLUE>Cardigans</BLUE> you
shipped us.
A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Rose Pink Dresses</BLUE> you recently shipped have
become big hits with the young cityfolk!
A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Gray Tailored Jackets</BLUE> you recently shipped
have become big hits with the young cityfolk!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

The <BLUE>Blue Jinbei</BLUE> you shipped to us are all over the
place here! Everybody loves it!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>Cool Blue Coats</BLUE> you shipped are the new
fashion with everyone here, young and old!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Violet Tank Tops</BLUE> you shipped are a
smash hit with all the folks back here!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Snow Coats</BLUE> you shipped have become
all the rage with the young people here.
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Hello. The girls here all adore the <BLUE>Red Chef's
Uniforms</BLUE> you shipped.
A Postcard from Ice Country

Everybody likes the <BLUE>Cream-Colored Dresses</BLUE> you
shipped us.
A Postcard from Cabin Country

The <BLUE>Wild Rockers</BLUE> you shipped to us are all over
the place here! Everybody loves them!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

The <BLUE>Girls' White School Uniforms</BLUE> you shipped are
all over the place here! Everyone loves them!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Navy Boys' Jumpsuits</BLUE> you shipped have
become all the rage with the young people here.
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>White Hoodies</BLUE> you shipped have become
all the rage with the young people here.
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Ninja Garb</BLUE> you shipped is a smash hit
with all the folks back home!
A Postcard from Ice Country

Everybody likes the <BLUE>Framed Glasses</BLUE> you shipped
us.
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>Straw Hats</BLUE> you shipped are the new fashion
with everyone here, young and old!
A Postcard from Ice Country
Everybody likes the <BLUE>Costumes</BLUE> you shipped us.
A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Wooden Swings</BLUE> you recently shipped have
become a big hit here! The children love them!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody loves the <BLUE>Bird Fountains</BLUE> you shipped
us! They're decorating the whole town now!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>White Benches</BLUE> you shipped are a favorite
here! Everyone says they're perfect for a quick rest.
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Chic Street Lamps</BLUE> you shipped are a
smash hit with all the young folk back home!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Blue Sofas</BLUE> you shipped have become all
the rage here.
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Hello. The girls here all adore the <BLUE>Red Flower
Arches</BLUE> you shipped to us.
A Postcard from Ice Country

The elders here all like those <BLUE>Garden Arches</BLUE> you
shipped us.
A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Lion Topiaries</BLUE> you recently shipped have
become a big hit. All the young boys love them!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody loves the <BLUE>Stone Columns</BLUE> you shipped.
They're decorating the whole town with them!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>White Parasol Tables</BLUE> you shipped are a
favorite here. You can see them all over town!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Sand Castles</BLUE> you shipped are a
smash hit with all the young'uns back home!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Hibiscus Flowerbeds</BLUE> you shipped have
become all the rage with garden fanciers here.
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Hello. The gardeners here all adore the <BLUE>Carnation
Flowerbeds</BLUE> you shipped to us.
A Postcard from Ice Country

Gardeners here all like the <BLUE>Potted Lilies</BLUE> you
shipped to us.
A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Red Flower Baskets</BLUE> you shipped have become
a big hit. All the gardeners love them!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>Purple Flower Baskets</BLUE> you shipped are a
favorite among our gardeners!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everyone loves the <BLUE>Cherry Blossom Trees</BLUE> you
shipped. They're all over town now!
A Postcard from Silk Country

The <BLUE>Palm Trees</BLUE> you recently shipped have become
a big hit here! You can see them all over town!
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Hello. Everyone here adores the <BLUE>Pig Mosquito
Coils</BLUE> you shipped. They're wonderfully calming.
A Postcard from Ice Country
Everyone loves the <BLUE>Black Cabinets</BLUE> you shipped us.
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Gold Turnips</BLUE> you shipped have become
all the rage.
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Hey! So, those <BLUE>Strawberries</BLUE> you shipped have
become super popular!
A Postcard from Sakura Country
The <BLUE>Pineapples</BLUE> you shipped to us are a real hit!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! Those <BLUE>Pumpkins</BLUE> you shipped to us sure
are getting popular!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Golden Corn</BLUE> you shipped has become all
the rage.
A Postcard from Tropical Country

The <BLUE>Golden Bok Choy</BLUE> you shipped has become a
big hit!
A Postcard from Ice Country
Your <BLUE>Watermelons</BLUE> are popular back home!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Hibiscus</BLUE> you shipped us sure is
getting popular!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Lemons</BLUE> you shipped us sure are
getting popular!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! The <BLUE>Apples</BLUE> you shipped us sure are
getting popular!
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Your <BLUE>Chocolate Cakes</BLUE> are renowned for their not-
too-sweet, not-too-tart deliciousness here!
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Your <BLUE>Melon Shakes</BLUE> are renowned for their cool,
tangy goodness here!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. Your <BLUE>Almond Caramels</BLUE> are garnering rave
reviews for their wonderful sweetness.
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody is raving about how yummy your <BLUE>Udon
with Egg</BLUE> dish is. The egg really is the best part!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

Your <BLUE>Focaccia</BLUE> is getting high marks from
everybody for how delicious it is!
A Postcard from Ice Country

Everybody says your <BLUE>Paella</BLUE> is great. The shellfish
in it is particularly beloved.
A Postcard from Ice Country

Everybody says your <BLUE>Burdock Root Salad</BLUE> is great.
The shellfish is the best part.
A Postcard from Silk Country

Your <BLUE>Acqua Pazza</BLUE> is getting great reviews for its
robust, intriguing flavor!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

Your <BLUE>Fruit Punch</BLUE> is getting high marks for its
flavor, and for how it encourages eating fruit!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! Everyone here's real fond of your various
<BLUE>Puddings</BLUE>. 'Specially the kids.
A Postcard from Tropical Country

Your <BLUE>Zebu Milk</BLUE> is renowned for its rich sweetness
here!
A Postcard from Ice Country
Everybody says your <BLUE>Herb Cheese</BLUE> is herbilicious.
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! Everyone here's real fond of your <BLUE>Cherry
Jam</BLUE>. Makes cherries fun to eat.
A Postcard from Silk Country

Your <BLUE>Herb Spread</BLUE> is getting great reviews for how
easy it makes it to get a serving of herbs a day.
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. Your <BLUE>Chocolate Spread</BLUE> is garnering rave
reviews for its chocolatey deliciousness.
A Postcard from Silk Country

Your <BLUE>Zebu Fruit Yogurt +</BLUE> is getting great reviews
for its luxurious deliciousness.
A Postcard from Sakura Country

Everyone is loving how rich and creamy the
<BLUE>Araucana Mayonnaise</BLUE> you sent to us is!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>Master Hoes</BLUE> you shipped to us are a farmer's
best friend!
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. The <BLUE>Master Watering Cans</BLUE> you shipped have
become all the rage here.
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody loves the <BLUE>Beautiful Blue-Gray Pots</BLUE> you
shipped to us. Especially the artists!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody loves the <BLUE>Gorgeous Crimson Plates</BLUE> you
shipped to us. Especially the artists!
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody loves the <BLUE>Bright Green Cups</BLUE> you
shipped to us. Especially the artists!
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! Everyone here's real fond of your <BLUE>Mango
Wine</BLUE>. 'Specially the ladies.
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. Your <BLUE>Orange Wine</BLUE> is garnering rave reviews
from the ladies of society here.
A Postcard from Wheat Country

Howdy! Everyone here's real fond of your <BLUE>Rose
Seduction</BLUE> fragrance. 'Specially the ladies.
A Postcard from Rose Country

Hey. Your <BLUE>Forest Whisper</BLUE> fragrance is garnering
rave reviews from the ladies of society here.
A Postcard from Cabin Country

Everybody loves the <BLUE>Blazing Waltz</BLUE> bouquet you
shipped to us. Especially the artists!
A Postcard from Sakura Country

The <BLUE>Earth's Blessings</BLUE> bouquet you shipped to us
is a favorite with collectors here.
■■■New Product Notice■■■

<GREEN>Silk Country</GREEN> has restocked all the popular items
you've been waiting for. 

       <GREEN>Asche of Silk Country</GREEN>
★★★New Items In Stock!!★★★

Hi! All those great items you've been looking for
from <GREEN>Cabin Country</GREEN> are back in stock. Come take
a look!

       <GREEN>Marielle of Cabin Country</GREEN>
◇◇◇New Products Available◇◇◇

<GREEN>Sakura Country</GREEN> has restocked all those traditional
items you have been waiting for. We'd love to see
you here.

       <GREEN>Yoshino of Sakura Country</GREEN>
●●●New Stuff Available!●●●

Howdy! We're all stocked up on great <GREEN>Wheat
Country</GREEN> merchandise! C'mon down and buy
some!

       <GREEN>Kenneth of Wheat Country</GREEN>
.........New Items For Sale.........

Hey. We have many new elegant and tasteful items
for sale. You won't find anything this fashionable
elsewhere. Do come and see them.

       <GREEN>Ennio of Rose Country</GREEN>
::-::-::New Sale Items::-::-::

I've got a lot of great new products today. They're
all really something. Can't wait to see you!

       <GREEN>Yolanda of Tropical Country</GREEN>
＊＊＊New Stuff＊＊＊

I brought new stuff. Come buy it.

       <GREEN>Katrina of Ice Country</GREEN>
New Items In Stock at the General Store

I stocked up on some new things at the General
Store. I'd love to see you drop on by. They really
are quite nice.

● General Store ●
Open : <BLUE>M・Tu・W・Th・F・Sa</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>9:00-18:00</BLUE>
△▽▲Notice of New Products▲▽△

The Antique Shop has new products available for
purchase. These unique items can only be found
here. We would love to see you.

● Antique Shop ●
Open : <BLUE>Tu・W・F・Su</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>9:00-19:00</BLUE>
New Menu Items!

The menu has been updated with new and
delicious dishes for you to enjoy. I can't wait to
see you here.


● Restaurant ●
Open : <BLUE>M・Tu・Th・F・Sa・Su</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>11:00-21:30</BLUE>
New Products In Stock!

We've got new and exciting items in stock to help
you with all your home improvement needs. Stop
on in!


● Carpenter Shop ●
Open : <BLUE>M・Tu・W・Th・F・Sa</BLUE>
Hours: <BLUE>8:00-18:00</BLUE>
Happy Birthday!!

Hey, I heard your birthday is today. Happy
birthday! Man, ever since you came here,
<MYNAME>, everything's been a blast. Come on
over sometime so we can hang out and have
some fun!


       <GREEN>Fritz</GREEN>
Birthday Wishes

Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>. It is only proper to
send a thoughtful card when the occasion
demands. 

These are the nuggets of wisdom that old age
teaches us.


       <GREEN>Klaus</GREEN>
Congrats! You're a Year Older

Happy Birthday! I've got a 3-course feast all lined
up for you at the restaurant to celebrate!

-- Or rather, I wish I did, but I'm too busy for that.
So I sent a card instead. Hope you don't mind!


       <GREEN>Raeger</GREEN>
Wishing You a Happy Birthday

Allow me to wish you a very happy birthday,
<MYNAME>. You have always been very kind to
me, and I greatly enjoy your company. That makes
the day of your birth a special day to me as well.


       <GREEN>Mistel</GREEN>
Happy Birthday

I heard today's your birthday. That's great! In my
homeland, birthdays are of supreme importance,
so we always have a big celebration.

Happy Birthday.


       <GREEN>Nadi</GREEN>
Happy Birthday To You

Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. The day I met you
was a wonderful day indeed. Here's hoping for
many more wonderful birthdays to come.


       <GREEN>Kamil</GREEN>
Birthday Wishes

Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>. Meeting you has
helped me change my life for the better. I am very
grateful to you. May you have many more happy
birthdays to come.


       <GREEN>Elise</GREEN>
Wishing You a Happy Birthday

Happy Birthday. My, that is a little embarrassing to
write, isn't it?

How long has it been since we met? I'm not sure I
could say. But every moment of it has been
precious to me.


       <GREEN>Iris</GREEN>
♪ Happy Birthday!! ♪

Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>! Meeting you has
really changed my outlook on life. May you
celebrate many more birthdays to come!


       <GREEN>Lillie</GREEN>
Happy Birthday To You!

Happy Birthday from me and all the animals in the
Safari. You're really popular with all of them, you
know! They can't wait to see you again.


       <GREEN>Agate</GREEN>
Wishing You A Happy Birthday

Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>. Please be sure you
have a healthy birthday and don't give in to the
temptation of sweets or over-partying. Good
health comes from proper nutrition, exercise and
sleep each and every day.


       <GREEN>Angela</GREEN>
Happy Birthday

I hear it's your birthday. I'm never sure what to
write in these things, so... Happy Birthday, I
guess!


       <GREEN>Licorice</GREEN>
In Recognition of Our Contract

I hereby recognize you, <MYNAME>, as my #1
lackey. Be grateful!


       <GREEN>Witchie</GREEN>
Hiya! It's Flik

Hiya! It's <GREEN>Flik</GREEN>, the Nature Sprite. I'm sure we'll be
seeing ya around lots, so it's nice to meet ya!


       <GREEN>Flik</GREEN>
From Mora

Uh, hi. It's <GREEN>Mora</GREEN> the Nature Sprite. It looks like
there's lotsa really yummy stuff in your town. I
can't wait to try it all. Oh, uh, and it's good to
meetcha.


       <GREEN>Mora</GREEN>
Greetings from Pepita

Greetings, <MYNAME>. I'm <GREEN>Pepita</GREEN>, the Nature
Sprite. It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
We'll be relyin' on your expertise in the future, and
look forward to receiving your advice.


       <GREEN>Pepita</GREEN>
Yo! It's Gusto!

Yo, <MYNAME>! It's <GREEN>Gusto</GREEN>, the Nature Sprite!
We've been soul-buddies since the instant we met,
you just didn't know it! Great to meet ya, soul-
buddy!!


       <GREEN>Gusto</GREEN>
Greetings from Torque

Dear <MYNAME>,
Hello. This is <GREEN>Torque</GREEN> the Nature Sprite. It seems
there are a great many intriguing things worth
researching in your town. I look forward to taking
this opportunity to investigate.


       <GREEN>Torque</GREEN>
A Pleasure To Meet You

Hello. This is your new neighbor, the little goddess
-- but you can call me <GREEN>Dessie</GREEN>. I was very glad to
meet you the other day.

I know I'm still learning a lot, but I look forward to
being your neighbor.


       <GREEN>Dessie</GREEN>
P.S. Don't forget to make offerings at the spring!
Spring Fashion Fiesta Theme
Fall Fashion Fiesta Theme

The theme for this year's Fall Fashion Fiesta has
been decided. It is:

<RED>Fashionable in <MOJI0>!</RED>

All participants, please have an outfit in the above
theme ready by Fall 13th. 


       <GREEN>Veronica</GREEN>

The theme for the upcoming Fashion Fiesta has
been decided. It is:

<RED>Fashionable <MOJI1> Outfits for <MOJI0>!</RED>

All participants, please ready an outfit in the above
theme and assemble at the event booth.

       <GREEN>Veronica</GREEN>

The theme for the upcoming Fashion Fiesta has
been decided. It is:

<RED>Fashionable <MOJI2> Outfits for <MOJI0>!</RED>

All participants, please ready an outfit in the above
theme and assemble at the event booth.

       <GREEN>Veronica</GREEN>

The theme for the upcoming Fashion Fiesta has
been decided. It is:

<RED><MOJI2> <MOJI1> Outfits!</RED>

All participants, please ready an outfit in the above
theme and assemble at the event booth.

       <GREEN>Veronica</GREEN>

The theme for the upcoming Fashion Fiesta has
been decided. It is:

<RED><MOJI2> <MOJI1> Outfits for <MOJI0>!</RED>

All participants, please ready an outfit in the above
theme and assemble at the event booth.

       <GREEN>Veronica</GREEN>
Cooking Contest 1st Place

Congratulations on your first Cooking Exhibition
win. Your dish was delectable!

Please do keep polishing your craft. You have too
much talent to waste.

I look forward to your next entry.


       <GREEN>Saffron</GREEN>
Harvest Festival 1st Place

That was your first Harvest Festival win, right?
Congrats! Your entry was wonderful.

Keep up the good work, respecting the earth and
putting your heart into all your crops.


      <GREEN>Matsuba</GREEN>
Livestock Festival 1st Place

Woof! Congrats on your first Livestock Expo blue
ribbon! Your entry was doggone good!

Keep practicing your skills and don't forget to
bring lots of puppy love for your animals!


        <GREEN>Woofio</GREEN>
Fashion Show 1st Place

Congratulations on your first place finish in the
Fashion Fiesta. Your taste is impeccable.

Do keep practicing and continue to keep abreast
of the latest trends. I know you'll go far.


        <GREEN>Del Cosa</GREEN>
Ta-Daaaah!

I hear you're taking good care of Witchie over
there. Glad to hear it. I'm, well -- you can call me
her Auntie. 

Keep looking out for her on my behalf, okay?
Thanks.


       <GREEN>The Witch</GREEN>
Dun Da-da-daaah!

Thank you so much for taking such good care of
Dessie, <MYNAME>. I've heard all about you from
the Nature Sprites. 

I hope you keep watching over her as wonderfully
as you have been.


       <GREEN>Gaia</GREEN>
Certification of Fishing Mastery

Congratulations, <MYNAME>! Your fishing skill
has not gone unrecognized. We present you with
the highest possible accolade for a fisherman: the
rank of <BLUE>Fisher King</BLUE>. We hope you continue to
enjoy fishing for years to come.


       <GREEN>Fishing Appreciation Society</GREEN>
Certification of Cooking Mastery

Congratulations, <MYNAME>! Your cooking skill
has not gone unrecognized. We present you with
the highest possible accolade for a chef: the rank
of <BLUE>Master Chef</BLUE>. We hope you continue to enjoy
cooking for years to come.


       <GREEN>Culinary Appreciation Society</GREEN>
Certification of Bug Collecting Mastery

Congratulations, <MYNAME>! Your insect
collecting skill has not gone unrecognized. We
present you with the highest possible accolade for
an insect collector: the rank of <BLUE>Insectoid King</BLUE>. We
hope you continue to enjoy collecting insects for
years to come.


       <GREEN>Entomology Appreciation Society</GREEN>
Thank-You Note

Congratulations! I hear you've received the highest
accolades for fishing, cooking and insect
collecting.

As Guild Master and a fellow citizen of this town,
I believe this wonderful achievement deserves
recognition, so I'm sending you this official notice
of your folk hero status.

       <GREEN>Veronica</GREEN>
Farm Appraisal

<MYNAME>, you have just begun your journey as
a farmer. The road ahead is long, but we look
forward to witnessing your progress. Accordingly,
we present you with the title of <BLUE>Novice Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will make your farm thrive.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, you have just begun your journey as
a farmer. The road ahead is long, but we look
forward to witnessing your progress. Accordingly,
we present you with the title of <BLUE>Egg Rancher</BLUE>. We
hope you will make your farm thrive.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, you have just begun your journey as
a farmer. The road ahead is long, but we look
forward to witnessing your progress. Accordingly,
we present you with the title of <BLUE>Chick Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will make your farm thrive.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, you have just begun your journey as
a farmer. The road ahead is long, but we look
forward to witnessing your progress. Accordingly,
we present you with the title of <BLUE>Rooster Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will make your farm thrive.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Provisional Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will continue to grow and expand
your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Scrappy Rancher</BLUE>. We
hope you will continue to grow and expand your
farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Journeyman Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will continue to grow and expand
your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Proficient Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will continue to grow and expand
your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Certified Rancher</BLUE>. We
hope you will continue to grow and expand your
farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Professorancher</BLUE>. We
hope you will continue to grow and expand your
farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Legendary Rancher</BLUE>.
We hope you will continue to grow and expand
your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, have you acclimated to farm work
yet? In recognition of your effort so far, we
present you with the title of <BLUE>Rancher Hero</BLUE>. We
hope you will continue to grow and expand your
farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
with the title of <BLUE>Alpha Rancher L1</BLUE>. We hope you
continue to work hard and grow your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
with the title of <BLUE>Alpha Rancher L2</BLUE>. We hope you
continue to work hard and grow your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
with the title of <BLUE>Alpha Rancher L3</BLUE>. We hope you
continue to work hard and grow your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
with the title of <BLUE>Alpha Rancher L4</BLUE>. We hope you
continue to work hard and grow your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
with the title of <BLUE>Alpha Rancher L5</BLUE>. We hope you
continue to work hard and grow your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
with the title of <BLUE>Alpha Rancher L6</BLUE>. We hope you
continue to work hard and grow your farm.


       <GREEN>Farming Appreciation Society</GREEN>

<MYNAME>, it looks like your farm is doing well.
Rumors of your skill abound even here. In
recognition of your great effort, we present you
